summary: Wanted for a long time, serial killer Gabriel Engel gets arrested in a spectacular police raid. Small town cop Michael Martens travels to the big city to interrogate him and finds out more then he is looking for.
cast: Norman Reedus|Christian von Aster|André Hennicke|Waltraud Witte|Konstantin Graudus|Heinz Hoenig|Wotan Wilke Möhring|Ulrike Krumbiegel|Hauke Diekamp|Jürgen Schornagel|Gudrun Ritter|Laura Alberta Szalski|Klaus Zmorek|Domenico D'Ambrosio|Holger Franke|Jockel Tschiersch|Hans Diehl|Bruno Grass|Natascha Paulick|Frank Kusche|Elisa Schrey|Edie Samland|Stefanie Fuchs|Isabel Bongard|Marie Lindner|Dietmar Horst Hedram|Laila Mohmand|Martin Umbach|Holger Reibiger|Nina Proll|Nadeshda Brennicke|Coco Brown|Lydia Kavungu|Rainer Laupichler|Milton Welsh|Leonardo Nigro|Maria Schuster|Thomas Klees|Romeo|Stefan Preuhs
keywords: serial killer|serial murderer|child murderer|serial child murderer|psychopathic killer
title: Antikörper
